name: Dapper Looper Mini 4
details:
LooperMain features:
Compact dub loop effect strip
3-Way footswitch with direct operation
24 Bit / 44.1 kHz audio
8 Storable loop memory slots
Unlimited overdubs with undo / redo function
Max. Total recording time: 240 minutes in (30 minutes over the 8 memory slots)
USB connection for loop import / export and management (free software available for download)
Controls: Loop Level - Rec Level
Switches: Forward / Backward loop memory
LED: 1 - 4
Foot switch: Rec / Play - Stop - Phrase
Connectors: Input (6.3 mm jack) - Output (6.3 mm jack) - Power supply connector (coaxial jack 5.5 x 2.1 mm - negative polarity inside) - USB headphones (3.5 mm stereo mini jack)
Power consumption: 180 mA
Power supply via a 9 V DC power supply unit (included)
Battery operation not possible
Dimensions (W x D x H): 197 x 65 x 42 mm
Weight: 417 g
